biotools.summary: Natural Antisense Transcripts (NATs), a kind of regulatory RNAs, occur prevalently in plant genomes and play significant roles in physiological and/or pathological processes. Plant Natural Antisense Transcripts DataBase is a platform for annotating and discovering NATs by integrating various data sources.

bioschemas.name: PlantNATsDB
